description: Closure evidence requirements for critique beads. Every critique bead closed after the gate is established must satisfy these evidence requirements.

matrix_entry.description: Bead must have an entry in tests/conformance/verification_matrix.json

test_commands.description: Row must have at least one non-empty test command in unit_cmds or e2e_cmds

artifact_references.description: Row must have at least one artifact path or log schema ref

close_blockers_empty.description: row.close_blockers must be empty (all obligations met)

legacy_exempt_note: Beads closed before bd-4rl gate was established. These are reported as informational debt, not failures.

enforcement.description: Legacy-exempt beads produce warnings; non-exempt closed beads produce failures
